summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, dated July 23, 2019, with high importance, informing that Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell the previous night, possibly a suicide attempt. It offers availability for further discussion.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; reported as having been found unresponsive in his cell, possibly due to a suicide attempt.

events.title: Epstein found unresponsive in cell
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell, with the email suggesting it was possibly a suicide attempt.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell on the night of July 22, 2019.
The incident was described as a possible suicide attempt in an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office.
The email was sent on July 23, 2019, and marked as high importance.
